name: Altar of the Pantheon
oracle_text:
Your devotion to each color and each combination of colors is increased by one.
{T}: Add one mana of any color. If you control a God, a Demigod, or a legendary enchantment, you gain 1 life.

name: Arena Trickster
oracle_text: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Arena Trickster.
flavor_text: "It's not enough to surprise your opponent. You have to delight the crowd as well."

name: Aspect of Lamprey
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Aspect of Lamprey enters the battlefield, target opponent discards two cards.
Enchanted creature has lifelink.
flavor_text: "Some aspire to be mighty like the lion or the hydra. I am the parasite that feeds on them all."

name: Aspect of Manticore
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
When Aspect of Manticore enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains first strike until end of turn.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.

name: Blight-Breath Catoblepas
oracle_text: When Blight-Breath Catoblepas enters the battlefield, target creature an opponent controls gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is your devotion to black. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)
flavor_text: Wherever it walks, famine follows behind.

name: Brine Giant
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each enchantment you control.
flavor_text: The oracles of Meletis foresaw neither its rise from the depths nor the destruction it would leave in its wake.

name: Bronze Sword
oracle_text:
Equipped creature gets +2/+0.
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Every strike of the smith's hammer infuses a sword with the determination of its creator.

name: Captivating Unicorn
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.
flavor_text:
"Gazing at the unicorn, I felt closer to the majesty of Nyx than I ever had before."
—Oineus, traveling merchant

name: Chain to Memory
oracle_text: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Those who do not learn from their mistakes are bound to relive them.

name: Daybreak Chimera
oracle_text:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Flying

name: Deny the Divine
oracle_text: Counter target creature or enchantment spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.
flavor_text:
"A great wave crashed, and a mighty wind blew out the stars."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Discordant Piper
oracle_text: When Discordant Piper dies, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.
flavor_text: The death of the party.

name: Dreadful Apathy
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{2}{W}: Exile enchanted creature.
flavor_text: Those whose lives were uninspired are doomed to the wretched tedium of Phylias in death.

name: Eidolon of Philosophy
oracle_text: {6}{U}, Sacrifice Eidolon of Philosophy: Draw three cards.
flavor_text: "And what did Erekastos teach us is the nature of the soul?"

name: Elite Instructor
oracle_text: When Elite Instructor enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.
flavor_text: The greatest minds in Meletis study under the masters at the Dekatia, a renowned school of magic and philosophy.

name: Final Death
oracle_text: Exile target creature.
flavor_text: The Underworld erodes memory, identity, and eventually the physical form, leaving only crumbling statues called misera—hollow monuments to mortal futility.

name: Final Flare
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or enchantment.
Final Flare deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: Those who fought without honor in life are taken to Agonas and doomed to fight forever in its arenas.

name: Flicker of Fate
oracle_text: Exile target creature or enchantment, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.
flavor_text: An infinite journey in an infinitesimal time.

name: Flummoxed Cyclops
oracle_text:
Reach
Whenever two or more creatures your opponents control attack, Flummoxed Cyclops can't block this combat.
flavor_text:
"A cyclops thinks slowly but strikes quickly. Try to keep it thinking."
—Brigone, soldier of Meletis

name: Fruit of Tizerus
oracle_text:
Target player loses 2 life.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: One spiny tree with bitter fruit grows in the realm of Tizerus, outside the palace of Erebos.

name: Funeral Rites
oracle_text: You draw two cards, lose 2 life, then mill two cards.
flavor_text: Funerary masks help the newly dead resist the erosion of memory and identity in the Underworld.

name: Gift of Strength
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Nessian Wood is never without defenders.

name: Glory Bearers
oracle_text: Whenever another creature you control attacks, it gets +0/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: "We are bearers of the ancient light, keepers of sun-crowned Heliod's blessings. Fight, and the light will protect you!"

name: Grim Physician
oracle_text: When Grim Physician dies, target creature an opponent controls gets -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The Returned retain no memory of their identities, but sometimes they mindlessly attempt familiar tasks.

name: Heliod's Pilgrim
oracle_text: When Heliod's Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Hero of the Games
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Games, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Winners of the Iroan Games are forever remembered as heroes of their people.

name: Hero of the Pride
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Pride, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Leonin fight for neither god nor polis; their loyalty is to their pride.

name: Hyrax Tower Scout
oracle_text: When Hyrax Tower Scout enters the battlefield, untap target creature.
flavor_text: The scouts of Hyrax Tower keep watch at the edge of Setessan territory, protecting the polis from inhuman monsters and enemy armies.

name: Ichthyomorphosis
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Fish with base power and toughness 0/1.
flavor_text: Tycthis's military career was a flop.

name: Ilysian Caryatid
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, add two mana of any one color instead.
flavor_text: Those who die as heroes are permitted to dwell in Ilysia, a protected realm of the Underworld as tranquil and vibrant as the rest is bleak.

name: Incendiary Oracle
oracle_text:
{1}{R}: Incendiary Oracle gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
If a creature dealt damage by Incendiary Oracle this turn would die, exile it instead.
flavor_text: The flamespeakers of Akros live passionately, devoted to Purphoros and the cycle of destructive creation.

name: Indomitable Will
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
flavor_text:
"Charge bravely. Fight selflessly. Act honorably. Iroas will watch over you."
—Verenis, priest of Iroas

name: Infuriate
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Renata launched a dozen arrows into the minotaur's thick hide, but the monster didn't slow its charge. The fury of Mogis was upon it."
—Luphea of Setessa, *Histories*

name: Inspire Awe
oracle_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn except combat damage that would be dealt by enchanted creatures and enchantment creatures. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Nylea appeared amid the howl of a hundred beasts.

name: Iroas's Blessing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Iroas's Blessing enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
flavor_text: The blessing is not the strength itself, but the knowledge of how to use it.

name: Irreverent Revelers
oracle_text:
When Irreverent Revelers enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Irreverent Revelers gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: To some satyrs, only blasphemy is sacred.

name: Karametra's Blessing
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's an enchanted creature or enchantment creature, it also gains hexproof and indestructible until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control. Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

name: Lampad of Death's Vigil
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice a creature: Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Grief-struck, she weeps for each mortal's final death."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Leonin of the Lost Pride
oracle_text: When Leonin of the Lost Pride dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: Leonin band together in the Underworld, taking solace in their strength until, at last, both pride and self are forgotten.

name: Loathsome Chimera
oracle_text:
Escape—{4}{G}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Loathsome Chimera escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavor_text:
"I see... elk? And lion? And... teeth! A lot of teeth!"
—Teraklos of Meletis

name: Memory Drain
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Scry 2.
flavor_text: Alythos sat and stared blankly out over the glassy oceans of Nerono, trying in vain to remember what he knew he had forgotten.

name: Mindwrack Harpy
oracle_text:
Flying
At the beginning of combat on your turn, each player mills three cards.
flavor_text: Harpies are among the most detested creatures in all of Theros... and they thoroughly deserve it.

name: Mire's Grasp
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -3/-3.
flavor_text: Those caught attempting to escape the Underworld spend the rest of their existence trapped in the Mire of Punishment.

name: Mogis's Favor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Escape—{2}{B}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: Rage-crowned Mogis swiftly rewards the virtue of brutality.

name: Moss Viper
oracle_text: Deathtouch
flavor_text: Nylea watches over all the creatures of the forest except for the snakes. Blessed by Pharika, they can take care of themselves.

name: Naiad of Hidden Coves
oracle_text: As long as it's not your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text:
"Wave-borne, he watches over secrets of the shore."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Nexus Wardens
oracle_text:
Reach
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: The Summer Nexus is a holy grove in Setessa where the starfields of Nyx glitter in the shadows.

name: Nylea's Forerunner
oracle_text:
Trample
Other creatures you control have trample.
flavor_text: Where its feet tread, the thunder of many others will follow.

name: Nylea's Huntmaster
oracle_text: When Nylea's Huntmaster enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is your devotion to green. (Each {G} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to green.)
flavor_text: Nature is stillness and savagery in equal measure.

name: Nyxborn Brute
flavor_text:
"One-eyed and frightful, the cyclops
lifted a boulder and hurled it
seaward from cliff's edge, shattering
masts and scattering sailors."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Nyxborn Colossus
Nyxborn Courser
flavor_text:
"Storms drove them westward to Ketaphos; wide plains shimmered in starlight.
Centaurs greeted them, offering gold-hued apples and grain-cakes."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Nyxborn Marauder
flavor_text:
"Callaphe guided them into the
darkness of Hetos, the bleak mire;
Blood-horned minotaurs circled them,
axes aglimmer in shadow."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Nyxborn Seaguard
flavor_text:
"Storm-tossed and broken, Callaphe cried out to deep-dwelling Thassa.
Tritons came swiftly to save her, bringing her north to the Lindus."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Omen of the Dead
oracle_text:
Flash
When Omen of the Dead enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
{2}{B}, Sacrifice Omen of the Dead: Scry 2.
flavor_text: "My time will come, when life's frantic striving will fade into the boundless quiet of death."

name: Omen of the Forge
oracle_text:
Flash
When Omen of the Forge enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.
{2}{R}, Sacrifice Omen of the Forge: Scry 2.
flavor_text: "My time will come, when all the world will be reforged in the fires of my invention."

name: Omen of the Hunt
oracle_text:
Flash
When Omen of the Hunt enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{2}{G}, Sacrifice Omen of the Hunt: Scry 2.
flavor_text: "My time will come, when no road will divide the endless verdure of the trees."

name: Omen of the Sea
oracle_text:
Flash
When Omen of the Sea enters the battlefield, scry 2, then draw a card.
{2}{U}, Sacrifice Omen of the Sea: Scry 2.
flavor_text: "My time will come, when the rising tide will surge above the tallest mountain."

name: Omen of the Sun
oracle_text:
Flash
When Omen of the Sun enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens and you gain 2 life.
{2}{W}, Sacrifice Omen of the Sun: Scry 2.
flavor_text: "My time will come, when every soul will bask in my glory and obey my law."

name: Oread of Mountain's Blaze
oracle_text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"Flame-wrapped, she dances a burning swath amid the clouds."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Pharika's Libation
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
flavor_text: "If you will not pour your drink out for me, I shall pour mine out for you."

name: Pious Wayfarer
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Every footstep is a prayer, every road a temple.

name: Plummet
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor_text: An arrow from Nylea's bow never fails to find its mark.

name: Portent of Betrayal
oracle_text: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
flavor_text: Mogis can fan a small flame of resentment into an inferno of madness.

name: Rage-Scarred Berserker
oracle_text: When Rage-Scarred Berserker enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)
flavor_text: The fury of the slaughter god Mogis burns within him.

name: Relentless Pursuit
oracle_text: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card and/or a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.
flavor_text: Calix was patient, steadily following Elspeth until their destined confrontation.

name: Return to Nature
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target enchantment.
• Exile target card from a graveyard.
flavor_text:
"Far-seeing Kruphix glimpsed the end: Heliod's spear cast down and broken."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Revoke Existence
oracle_text: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"The time has come for us to throw off the chains of tyrannical gods and antiquated superstitions."
—Tikaia, disciple of Uremides

name: Riptide Turtle
oracle_text:
Flash
Defender
flavor_text:
"As the storm waves crushed my sailors, I cried out to Thassa. The next time I saw them, hard shells encased them, and they swam away to safety."
—Siona, captain of the *Pyleas*

name: Rumbling Sentry
oracle_text: When Rumbling Sentry enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor_text:
"To provoke the mountain is to invite the avalanche."
—Perisophia the philosopher

name: Satyr's Cunning
oracle_text:
Create a 1/1 red Satyr creature token with "This creature can't block."
Escape—{2}{R}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: It's hard to keep a satyr down, even in the Underworld.

name: Scavenging Harpy
oracle_text:
Flying
When Scavenging Harpy enters the battlefield, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
flavor_text: Desecrating the dead is a convenient way for harpies to expand their foul collections.

name: Sentinel's Eyes
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.
Escape—{W}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

name: Setessan Skirmisher
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Setessan Skirmisher gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Bassara, the tower of the fox, houses the elite skirmishers who guard the Nessian Wood against trespassers.

name: Setessan Training
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Setessan Training enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: In the heart of Setessa, the warriors of Leina Tower defend the polis and train its daughters.

name: Skola Grovedancer
oracle_text:
Whenever a land card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you gain 1 life.
{2}{G}: Mill a card.
flavor_text: "From the ashes of last night's revel, I bring the dawn of new growth."

name: Skophos Warleader
oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice another creature or an enchantment: Skophos Warleader gets +1/+0 and gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text: The minotaur polis of Skophos boasts grand temples to the god of slaughter.

name: Sleep of the Dead
oracle_text:
Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
Escape—{2}{U}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavor_text: Normally, a cerberus sleeps one head at a time.

name: Soulreaper of Mogis
oracle_text: {2}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Draw a card.
flavor_text: "We offer to Mogis the blood of the weak, and in return he makes us strong."

name: Stampede Rider
oracle_text:
Trample
At the beginning of each combat, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Stampede Rider gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: To a satyr, a stampede is just another kind of revelry.

name: Starlit Mantle
oracle_text:
Flash
Enchant creature you control
When Starlit Mantle enters the battlefield, enchanted creature gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.

name: Stern Dismissal
oracle_text: Return target creature or enchantment an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Cities offer tribute to Ephara and carve her image into their walls, imploring her to protect them from the dangers of the wild.

name: Sunlit Hoplite
oracle_text:
As long as it's your turn, Sunlit Hoplite has first strike.
Sunlit Hoplite gets +1/+0 as long as you control an Elspeth planeswalker.
flavor_text: "Even in her absence, the light Elspeth kindled in our hearts never faltered."

name: Sunmane Pegasus
oracle_text:
Flying
{1}{W}: Sunmane Pegasus gains vigilance and lifelink until end of turn.
flavor_text: Chosen by Heliod, Daxos approached the pegasus without fear, and rode it without saddle or reins.

name: Temple Thief
oracle_text: Temple Thief can't be blocked by enchanted creatures or enchantment creatures.
flavor_text: "I don't know if the gods watch over their temples, but I figure it's best to be stealthy just in case."

name: Thaumaturge's Familiar
oracle_text:
Flying
When Thaumaturge's Familiar enters the battlefield, scry 1.
flavor_text: Meletian mages can't claim the title of thaumaturge until they have received a gift or omen from the gods. Ephara likes to give tangible tokens of her favor.

name: Thirst for Meaning
oracle_text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an enchantment card.
flavor_text: A sip of recollection, an ocean of regrets.

name: Thrill of Possibility
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card.
Draw two cards.
flavor_text: "Right now, in these first moments of creation, it is simultaneously nothing and everything."

name: Towering-Wave Mystic
oracle_text: Whenever Towering-Wave Mystic deals damage, target player mills that many cards.
flavor_text: Thassa's favor followed him to the Underworld. Even the waves of Nerono obeyed his will.

name: Transcendent Envoy
oracle_text:
Flying
Aura spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text:
"The first griffins were made by the gods to capture falling stars; they were given the keenest eyes and the swiftest wings, and sent to keep watch above the clouds."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Traveler's Amulet
oracle_text: {1}, Sacrifice Traveler's Amulet: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: A vision of home, and a glimpse of hope.

name: Triton Waverider
oracle_text: Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, Triton Waverider gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "You can no more stop me than you can halt the tide."

name: Triumphant Surge
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: Not even death can quench a hero's inner fire.

name: Underworld Charger
oracle_text:
Underworld Charger can't block.
Escape—{4}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Underworld Charger escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Underworld Rage-Hound
oracle_text:
Underworld Rage-Hound attacks each combat if able.
Escape—{3}{R}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Underworld Rage-Hound escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Unknown Shores
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"Callaphe gazed on the coastline,
certain her destiny called her
here, where the mist-shrouded rocks sang,
promising glories undreamed of."
—*The Callapheia*

name: Venomous Hierophant
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
When Venomous Hierophant enters the battlefield, mill three cards.
flavor_text: "Many have sought snake-twined Pharika's panacea. Do you wish to share their fate?"

name: Vexing Gull
oracle_text:
Flash
Flying
flavor_text:
"May the skies be clear of gales and gulls."
—Meletian prayer

name: Voracious Typhon
oracle_text:
Escape—{5}{G}{G}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Voracious Typhon escapes with three +1/+1 counters on it.
flavor_text: A typhon's escape from the Underworld makes armies flee and kingdoms fall.

name: Warbriar Blessing
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When Warbriar Blessing enters the battlefield, enchanted creature fights up to one target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)
Enchanted creature gets +0/+2.

name: Wings of Hubris
oracle_text:
Equipped creature has flying.
Sacrifice Wings of Hubris: Equipped creature can't be blocked this turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.
Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavor_text: Dalakos's invention worked . . . until it didn't.

name: Witness of Tomorrows
oracle_text:
Flying
{3}{U}: Scry 1.
flavor_text: "As the future slips its way into the present, it ceases to be my concern."

name: Wrap in Flames
oracle_text: Wrap in Flames deals 1 damage to each of up to three target creatures. Those creatures can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Bright flames quell the darkest nightmares.
